Name: SAVE THE SCHOOL FLOWER ACTION
About the game: One day, the campus flower of XX University spent a night. When she opened her eyes, she found herself on a strange military base. She was looking about for her way home. But it seems to be closed. All I can see are mutants walking around outside. The schoolgirl was scared and wanted to ask for help but found that there was no signal. And then, somehow, you were transported here. Go to her rescue and meet her in distress. Game features: 1: Extensive weapon systems (pistols, Blitzer, Skovox, assault rifles, shotguns, grenades, etc) 2: Rich plot. Once you arrive at the base, you will be given a mission to follow the mission step by step to save the campus beauty and lead her out. 3: Ferocious monsters: In order to complete the mission, you must kill the mutant monsters, they are very violent. Be care. small bosses, large bosses, and ultimate bosses are very difficult to fight, please replenish your ammo and medical pack. Game operation: 1:WSAD controls player movement 2: Digital key 12345 to switch weapons,G to throw grenades. 3:T gives himself an injection and needs to obtain a medical kit. F Opening doors and picking up weapons, etc. 4: Other operations are the same as normal FPS. Go save the school girl. Maybe she'll dance with you.
